mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT(USER_ID, PAY_DATE, PAY_COST, SUB_TERM, MERCHANT_UID) VALUES(#{userId}, default, #{payCost}, #{subTerm}, #{merchantUid})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, PAY_DATE, PAY_COST, SUB_TERM, MERCHANT_UID FROM PAYMENT WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND ROWNUM =1 ORDER BY PAY_DATE DESC
